reviews.review: Ну такое... Бывало й лутче времена в игре,играть можно,Valve можно ножык.

is better if u don't play this
edit 
play valorant

I had a girlfriend before I played this game, but after I downloading this game, I received a phone call from her saying she found a new person and was leaving me. I was devastated. So I started grinding on this game 24/7. It became natural for me. I couldn't put this game down. I sold my brother on eBay just for money to buy skins, I wouldn't eat for days, I would shake like michal j fox when i couldn't get my cs fix. Eventually I played so much my family had decayed but i didnt care lol fucc u mom and dad. I still play this game every single day for a minimum of 27 hours a day and play with my tongue on my keyboard and my belly button on the mouse. It's the only way this game is any challenge to me anymore. I am thankful for these amazing memories, but sadly, sacrifices had to be made. worthy sacrifices indeed.
игра для дебиков и для Вани
Better anticheat would be nice, and sometimes the hitbox is cringe. However, it's a fun game to play.
Эта игра тупо класс но в ней тоже есть свои недостатки на деюсь игру будут усовершенствовать и вскоре она будет шедевром
Melhora esse anti cheat ai Valve, e me da uma Dragon lore ai
